TRAVEL NEWS



In the Headlines From Cheapflights.com's daily travel news and other sources:  AirTran spring-thru-fall sale ends June 5  Book by May 30 to save on Florida to Caribbean Flights (thru Nov) on American Airlines  United Airlines moves up departure times on some early-morning flights  Book by June 7 to save on Southwest Airlines Vegas' air/hotel packages  New American Airlines Web site features booking grid with fares and flight times  jetBlue celebrates new NYC/JFK to Nantucket flights with one-way fares from $79 
 TSA to scan carry-on liquids at major airports 
 JD Powers study lists top airports The Lighter Side of Travel  Borat to Pen Travel Guidebooks  Misbehaving Tourists: Bad Manners Are a Global Phenomenon  Elvis Hits the High Seas on Nostalgia Cruise  Rolling Stone Picks the 25 Best Road SongsTrip Planning & Destinations  Cheapflights' Tips for Summer Air Travel  What's Free and Fun in NYC This Summer  Clubs, Interests Allow Solitary Travelers to Connect on the Road  Travel Writers Share Their Favorite Summer Getaway Spots  Amusement Parks Woo Families, Kids With New and Updated Rides  When Evaluating Travel Deals, Don't Overlook These Questions  Checking Your Bags? Check Airline Fees to Avoid Costly Surprises  Plan Ahead to Snag Deals and Discounts at Disney World






 






 
GETAWAY CALENDAR



Houston (TX), thru June 30: Texas Music Festival Maui (HI), June 1317: Maui Film Festival New York City, June 917: Caribbean Week; June 12: Museum Mile Festival Pittsburgh (PA), June 117: Three Rivers Arts Festival San Diego (CA), June 8 thru July 4: San Diego County Fair San Francisco (CA), June 23: Union Street FestivalWashington (D.C.), June 228: Start With the Arts Family Festival Coming Soon: Chicago (IL), June 2324: Summerfest (Lincoln Park); June 29July 8: Taste of ChicagoColchester (VT), Lake Champlain, June 1618: Father's Day Fishing Derbies Los Angeles (CA), June 21July 1: Los Angeles International Film Festival Manchester (TN), June 1417: The Police are among 100+ bands performing at the Bonnaroo Music Arts Festival. San Francisco (CA), June 1617: The North Beach Festival, one of the most popular U.S. street fairs Washington (D.C.), June 2324: National Barbecue Battle; Caribbean Carnival Parade
